headline: Cry Freedom
abstract: In “Fight of the Century,” edited by Michael Chabon and Ayelet Waldman, contributors including Jacqueline Woodson, Dave Eggers and Scott Turow explicate landmark A.C.L.U. cases.
lead_paragraph: FIGHT OF THE CENTURY Writers Reflect on 100 Years of Landmark ACLU CasesEdited by Michael Chabon and Ayelet Waldman
keywords: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
Fight of the Century: Jack Johnson, Joe Louis, and the Struggle for Racial Equality (Book)
